page.title: 02The Roads & By-pass.
page.content: { Beckington desperately needs a {by-pass. 'When we go to school we have to cross the main road but next year there is going to be a by-pass and the road will be a lot less noisy. 'When the by-pass is made it will make the village happier and I will walk to school on my own and walk home by myself' { 'Beckington is where I live. My house {is very old. On Thursdays I go to cubs {which is held in the village hall. { Where I live there are not any {children to play with so I play with {my brother and sister. There is a main {road outside our gates and I am not {allowed to go out of the gates. I like {living in Beckington but not where I {live at the moment because I have to {cross the main road to get to the {other children.'
